net.grinder.engine.process
Interface ThreadLogger

All Superinterfaces:
Logger
interface ThreadLogger
extends Logger

A Logger that knows some thread specific context.

getCurrentRunNumber

int getCurrentRunNumber()
Returns:
The current run number. -1 indicates that there is no current run.

Parameters:
